name: obnoxiously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a very unpleasant or rude way: obnoxiously arrogant/drunk She obnoxiously corrected everything I said. See
obnoxious
More examplesFewer examplesHe was obnoxiously aggressive toward women.He acted obnoxiously but was still sort of lovable.They sold off their assets to become obnoxiously rich.
